TEXT.TITLE: CAESARS WORLD <CAW> SAYS IT MULLS RESTRUCTURING
TEXT.BODY: Caesars World Inc, in rejecting a 28 dlr a share takeover bid by New York investor Martin Sosnoff, said it is considering alternatives that include a restructuring of the company and the sale to someone else. In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Caesars World said its board decided at a special meeting yesterday to "explore and investigate" several alternatives in an effort to thwart Sosnoff's takeover attempt.
